about_the_game:
Welcome to The Green Book: Your Cozy Journey into Magical Plant Shopkeeping!

Step into the enchanting world of The Green Book, where the magic of nature meets the charm of shopkeeping. In this delightful game, you'll cultivate a variety of whimsical plants and sell them in your cozy little shop. Whether you're a seasoned gardener or a budding green thumb, The Green Book offers a serene escape into a land where every leaf tells a story.

Features:

  • Grow Your Plants. Watch as your shop’s inventory flourishes with an array of mystical plants. Each plant grows at its own pace, revealing its beauty and magic over time.
  • Track Your Progress. Keep an eye on your plants' growth with detailed progress indicators. See how many plants you've nurtured and celebrate each milestone as your garden thrives.
  • Personalize Your Space. Customize your shop to reflect your personal style. Arrange your plants, add decorative elements, and create a serene sanctuary that’s uniquely yours.
  • Relaxing Gameplay. Enjoy a soothing, stress-free environment where you can unwind and enjoy the simple pleasures of gardening.

Grow and Care

In The Green Book you can grow plants, care for them, and discover new ones. To keep the plant from dying, you need to keep it watered, clean it, prune it, add fertilizer, and treat it. In addition, each plant has its own behavior and skills that can also affect the plants around.

Discover

The player doesn't just collect plants in a book; they collect the stories of each one. A detailed description of each flower's origin immerses the player in the magical forest's wonderful world and reveals its hidden facets. To uncover the entire story of a plant, you need to complete tasks as the game progresses.

Customize Your Place

In the game you can customize the environment around you, as well as the appearance of the bear. Thereby creating your own unique look and style that you will most enjoy playing with.

Fulfill Quests and Expand

Fulfill the quests that you are given by the visitors of your shop. With the help of rewards for quests you can unlock additional abilities of the bear to better trade or easier care of plants. Develop the town by inviting new vendors that will allow you to fill your shop with better assortments. Discover hidden locations on the map.

Engaging Mini-Games

Various mini-games will allow you to diversify gameplay in between growing plants. Prune or clean the plant, unlock new music tracks, glue a broken pot together. These and many other mini games will definitely not let you get bored in the process of developing your shop.
